main event: A bright red light, described as the size of a man's head, was observed hovering on various headings for 12 to 15 minutes over Inglis, Florida.
interesting points: The object was observed several times between 2am and 6am over the past 3-4 weeks.
The object was sighted about 15 miles south-west of the Florida Power plant near Inglis, Florida, near the mouth of a river.
The observers included employees of the Florida Power plant, including ___, ___, and ___.
The weather was calm and slightly foggy, and no physical evidence or photographs were obtained.
The reliability and experience of the observers is unknown.
sighted object: a bright red light the size of a man's head
